specs.name:
Front suspension: Multi-link with high performance gas shock
							absorbers

Rear suspension: Multi-link with high performance gas shock
							absorbers
4-wheel Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) with Electronic Brake-force Distribution (EBD) and Brake Assist (BA)
18-inch premium alloy wheels with P245/45R18 tires
4-wheel Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) with Electronic Brake-force Distribution (EBD) and Brake Assist (BA)
Nine airbags: Advanced dual front airbags with Occupant Classification System (OCS), front and rear seat-mounted side-impact airbags, roof-mounted side-curtain airbags and driver's knee airbag
Smart Cruise Control (SCC) with stop/start functionality
Front and Rear Parking Sensors with Rear Cross-traffic Alert
Tire Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS) with individual tire pressure indicator
Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) with Automatic Vehicle Hold (AVH)
Dual power-folding heated side mirrors with approach lamps (Genesis name and logo)
Acoustic laminated windshield and side windows; front door water-repellant glass
Dual asymmetrical exhaust tips integrated with rear bumper

Power windows with front and rear auto-down/up with pinch
							protection
12-way power driver seat with power lumbar support
Power driver seat cushion extension and side bolsters

Integrated Memory System (IMS) for driver seat, outside
							mirrors and steering column
Center armrest with dual cupholders and control console
Leather-wrapped steering wheel and shift knob
Auto-dimming inside rearview mirror with compass and HomeLink

Navigation system with HD 9.2-inch LCD screen and DIS
							Multimedia Controller

Electroluminescent Gauge Cluster with 4.2-inch TFT LCD
							screen
Electroluminescent Gauge Cluster with 7-inch TFT LCD screen
Proximity Key with push button start
